title: mic problem due to android 10 october 6 updates
content:
hi,

i have mic problem from the last 3 months. i was waiting for the dec 2020 updates to fix mic issue but google mentioned in updates dec 2020 there will be no updates after october 2020 updates for pixel phones. i am still wandering there is no solution at my end working becasue its google updates issue and i do not have options to downgrade the operation system to 9.

OEM unlock is disable by default. even i can not enable to downgrade the operating system.'

please help me to fix my device issue as my phone is useless becasue of mic.

thanks
